title: Frames dropping from 80 (where I capped it) to 30, sometimes 3
body: Hi, I am experiencing massive frame drops for the past 2-3 patches. At first, I thought it was my GPU, but when I reinstalled all the drivers, I realized it wasn't my GPU. I turned my setting down to low, and it still makes my frames drop. My pc is up to date on everything, Windows updates, CPU drivers, GPU driver, Motherboard Drivers, etc. I hope someone can help me with this, as it's affecting my gameplay.

replies.body: Thanks for all the troubleshooting so far!  There might be other issues causing your fps to drop, like corrupt game files.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a series of different steps that can be taken to help get you squared away.  Let me know how that goes for you!

Hello, when I looked at some of them, I disabled some of the things I was able to disable, and I went into a custom to check my fps, and it was still dropping. Are there any other suggestions you have? If anything, I'll just reinstall the game!

If the guide wasn't able to get this resoled, hope is not lost!  We'd be happy to help out with your specific issue through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this further, and will respond as soon as possible!  

To help provide more context, gather a set of logs that can be automatically obtained through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), then attach them to the ticket.  Thanks for your patience, you'll be in good hands!
